events.name: Scaling frontend development with micro frontends
events.description: In recent years, we've seen an explosion in the use of microservices in order to avoid the limitations of backend monoliths. However, many organisations continue to struggle with large, monolithic frontend codebases. In this talk, we'll explore how micro frontends can help make your code cleaner, your teams more autonomous, and enable incremental upgrades to your tech stack. By exploring real-world examples, you'll gain an understanding of when this architectural style can be helpful, and how to begin using it in your own projects.
events.location: ThoughtWorks , 18 cross street #11-08 China Sq Central (S)048423, Singapore

events.name: FREE Data Science Info Session [NO PROGRAMMING BACKGROUND REQUIRED]
events.description:
Have a background in coding but wish to learn more? Or maybe no background at all? Here at CodeGakko, we'll be hosting a second FREE info session. Basic concepts of Data Science such as regression and classification, data models, applications of data science, as well as a live demonstration using Python will be showcased.
Details of the info session are as follows:
Date: 11th April 2018Time: 7 pm - 8.30 pmVenue: Adam Khoo Learning Centre @ Novena Square 2Price: FREE!
Bring your friends along and we look forward to seeing you there!
Feel free to contact us for any enquiries at info@codegakko.com or you could check out our website at http://www.codegakko.com/
events.location: Adam Khoo Learning Center @ Novena Square 2, #04-27 Square 2, Singapore 307506

events.name: WordPress Meetup (April 2018) - Build Your Own Medium, and CSS Grid
events.description: For this month's meetup, we will have Automatticians speaking! Talk 1: Build Your Own Medium Using WordPress.comSpeaker: Nagesh Pai Talk 2: Journey Through CSS GridsSpeaker: Sudipto Mondal And if we get more time - Open Q&A:Please comment (below) on topics you would like to discuss, experts & enthusiasts present will answer questions. This will be casual. Possible topics could be - • What makes a good theme?? • My site loads slow, how do I make it faster? • And more (just comment) Are you interested in sharing something about WordPress as well? Let us know! Do join us from 7pm for a 7:30pm start. We're always looking for speakers and volunteers to help with our meetups! Please contact us if you're interested in helping out.
events.location: General Assembly @ Spacemob, 8 Claymore Hill, Singapore 229572

events.name: Create Video On-The-Go with iMovie iOS Workshop
events.description:
Love shooting videos while traveling? Wish to create a video that catches people's eyes? Want to learn how you can fully utilise the FREE iMovie app on your iPad or iPhone to edit your footages and tell great stories on the go? Well, this workshop is for you!




Technology nowadays have changed the way how we see and do things, it gives us the flexibility to create and express ourselves almost without boundaries in many different ways. In this case, iMovie.

Turn your videos into movie magic.
With iMovie you can enjoy your videos like never before. It’s easy to browse your clips and create Hollywood-style trailers and stunning 4K-resolution movies. You can even start editing on iPhone or iPad, then finish on your Mac. And when you’re ready to premiere your movie on all your devices, iMovie Theater rolls out the red carpet.



Make Movies Easily. From the first scene to the last.
It’s never been easier to make movies. Just choose your clips, then add titles, music and effects. iMovie even supports 4K video for stunning cinema-quality films. And that, ladies and gentlemen, is a wrap.

What you will learn
In this workshop you will learn how to import your footage, setting up project file, familiarise editing tools, combining footages, adding text and effects, audio editing, exporting and more! So don't missed out this chance to learn this amazing application.
P/S: You are recommended to download the iMovie app on your iOS devices before attending the workshop.

See ya real soon!
events.location: Switch AEON Mall Bandar Dato’ Onn, Lot F29, First Floor, Aeon Mall Kempas, No. 3, Jalan Dato’Onn, Bandar Dato’Onn,, Johor Bahru 81100
